segment.source: Securing the communication between components in an App-V infrastructure is only one element in securing the environment.
segment.target: Securing the communication between components in an App-V infrastructure is only one element in securing the environment.

segment.source: Using a firewall program on the server can help reduce the attack surface area.
segment.target: Using a firewall program on the server can help reduce the attack surface area.

segment.source: The topics in this section provide procedures for configuring Windows built-in firewall capabilities that support App-V.
segment.target: The topics in this section provide procedures for configuring Windows built-in firewall capabilities that support App-V.

segment.source: These procedures assume that you installed a Management Server and that it has been configured for RTSPS communication.
segment.target: These procedures assume that you installed a Management Server and that it has been configured for RTSPS communication.

segment.source: Notes are included in the procedures for Streaming Servers and environments where RTSP is being used for communication.
segment.target: Notes are included in the procedures for Streaming Servers and environments where RTSP is being used for communication.

segment.source: How to Configure Windows Server 2003 Firewall for App-V
segment.target: How to Configure Windows Server 2003 Firewall for App-V

segment.source: Provides a procedure you can use to configure the Windows Server 2003 firewall for App-V.
segment.target: Provides a procedure you can use to configure the Windows Server 2003 firewall for App-V.

segment.source: How to Configure Windows Server 2008 Firewall for App-V
segment.target: How to Configure Windows Server 2008 Firewall for App-V

segment.source: Provides a procedure you can use to configure the Windows Server 2008 firewall for App-V.
segment.target: Provides a procedure you can use to configure the Windows Server 2008 firewall for App-V.
